summary: Housemaid Georgette (Girardot) loves to gossip and this causes major trouble to people around her.
cast: Annie Girardot|Bernard Blier|Mireille Darc|Jean Le Poulain|Sim|Micheline Luccioni|Anicée Alvina|Jean Carmet|Robert Dalban|Evelyne Dress|Agnès Duval|Daniel Lecourtois|Monique Morisi|Jean-Marie Rivière|Dominique Zardi|Catherine Samie|Jean-Pierre Darras|Josée Yanne|Michel Audiard|Marc Doelnitz|Jacques Hilling|René Lebrun

title: Elle boit pas, elle fume pas, elle drague pas, mais... elle cause!
